text: "Passengers" is a 1984 song by Elton John. It was taken from his 18th studio album Breaking Hearts. It went to number 5 in the United Kingdom, number 10 in Zimbabwe, number 38 in New Zealand, number 27 in Switzerland and number 5 in Ireland and Australia. It was not released in the United States. It has not been played live in concert since 1985. Category:1984 songs Category:Elton John songs Category:Folk rock songs
title: Passengers (Elton John song)
